Header: Foundation Stone Laid for new Building at SF-J Regional Office
Content: Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna on Wednesday (16) organized a brief event to lay the foundation stone for construction of an accommodation building for Other Ranks serving the Regional Accounts Office of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna. The Commander Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya laid the foundation stone for it at the auspicious minute, amidst ‘Prith’ Chanting. Ven Kongala Siri Damma Thero of Sri Naga Viharaya Jaffna performed religious rites. Senior Staff Officers, Officers and Other Ranks also participated in the occasion.
